languages.text: {n}Возле реликвария молится юноша. Его волосы растрепаны, форма со следами пота измята, а под глазами залегли темные круги. При вашем приближении он вскакивает с колен и дерганым движением складывает {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилу{/g}.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы здесь! Я верил... нет, я знал, что вы придете!"

{n}A young man is praying beside the reliquary. His hair is dishevelled and his sweat-stained uniform is crumpled. Dark circles have formed underneath his eyes. As you approach, he jumps up from his knees and makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} with a jerky motion.{/n} "Lord Captain! You are here! I believed— nay, I knew you would come!"
languages.original_text: {n}Возле реликвария молится юноша. Его волосы растрепаны, форма со следами пота измята, а под глазами залегли темные круги. При вашем приближении он вскакивает с колен и дерганым движением складывает {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}аквилу{/g}.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, вы здесь! Я верил... нет, я знал, что вы придете!"

languages.text: {n}Un jeune homme est agenouillé devant le reliquaire, absorbé dans ses prières. Ses cheveux sont ébouriffés, des taches de sueurs sont visibles sur son uniforme froissé et ses yeux sont profondément cernés. Lorsque vous vous approchez, il se relève brusquement et fait le signe de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} d'un geste saccadé.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Vous voilà ! J'espérais... Non, je savais que vous viendriez ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A young man is praying beside the reliquary. His hair is dishevelled and his sweat-stained uniform is crumpled. Dark circles have formed underneath his eyes. As you approach, he jumps up from his knees and makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} with a jerky motion.{/n} "Lord Captain! You are here! I believed— nay, I knew you would come!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un jeune homme est agenouillé devant le reliquaire, absorbé dans ses prières. Ses cheveux sont ébouriffés, des taches de sueurs sont visibles sur son uniforme froissé et ses yeux sont profondément cernés. Lorsque vous vous approchez, il se relève brusquement et fait le signe de l'Aquila d'un geste saccadé.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Vous voilà ! J'espérais... Non, je savais que vous viendriez ! »

languages.text: {n}Hay un hombre joven rezando junto al relicario. Tiene el cabello enmarañado y el uniforme arrugado y sudoroso. Tiene unas ojeras grandes y oscuras. Cuando te aproximas, se pone en pie de un brinco y hace el signo del {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} con un movimiento brusco.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! ¡Ha venido! Esperaba que... ¡no, sabía que vendría!».
languages.original_text: {n}A young man is praying beside the reliquary. His hair is dishevelled and his sweat-stained uniform is crumpled. Dark circles have formed underneath his eyes. As you approach, he jumps up from his knees and makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} with a jerky motion.{/n} "Lord Captain! You are here! I believed— nay, I knew you would come!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hay un hombre joven rezando junto al relicario. Tiene el cabello enmarañado y el uniforme arrugado y sudoroso. Tiene unas ojeras grandes y oscuras. Cuando te aproximas, se pone en pie de un brinco y hace el signo del Aquila con un movimiento brusco.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! ¡Ha venido! Esperaba que... ¡no, sabía que vendría!».

languages.text: {n}一位年轻人正在圣骨匣旁祈祷，他头发蓬乱，眼睛下面浮现着黑色的眼圈，皱巴巴的制服满是汗渍。当你接近时，他猛然跳了起来，以急促的动作比了个{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}双头鹰{/g}手势。{/n}“舰长大人！您来了！我一直相信——不，我早就知道您一定会来！”
languages.original_text: {n}A young man is praying beside the reliquary. His hair is dishevelled and his sweat-stained uniform is crumpled. Dark circles have formed underneath his eyes. As you approach, he jumps up from his knees and makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} with a jerky motion.{/n} "Lord Captain! You are here! I believed— nay, I knew you would come!"

traits.locale_text: {n}一位年轻人正在圣骨匣旁祈祷，他头发蓬乱，眼睛下面出现了黑眼圈，皱巴巴的制服满是汗渍。当你接近时，他猛然跳了起来，以急促的动作比了个双头鹰手势。{/n}“舰长大人！您来了！我一直相信——不，我早就知道您一定会来！”

languages.text: {n}青年が 聖遺物箱の横で祈っている。髪は乱れ、汗で汚れた制服はくしゃくしゃだ。目の下にはクマができている。あなたが近づくと、膝をついていた彼は飛び上がり、ぎこちない動きで{g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}アクィラ{/g}の印を結んだ。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！ここにいたのですね！きっとあなたが来てくれると、信じていました！いえ、あなたが来てくださると分かっていました！」
languages.original_text: {n}A young man is praying beside the reliquary. His hair is dishevelled and his sweat-stained uniform is crumpled. Dark circles have formed underneath his eyes. As you approach, he jumps up from his knees and makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} with a jerky motion.{/n} "Lord Captain! You are here! I believed— nay, I knew you would come!"

traits.locale_text: {n}青年が 聖遺物箱の横で祈っている。髪は乱れ、汗で汚れた制服はくしゃくしゃだ。目の下にはクマができている。あなたが近づくと、膝をついていた彼は飛び上がり、ぎこちない動きでアクィラの印を結んだ。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン！ここにいたのですね！きっとあなたが来てくれると、信じていました！いえ、分かっていました！」

languages.text: {n}Ein junger Mann betet neben dem Reliquiar. Seine Haare sind zerzaust, seine verschwitzte Uniform ist zerknittert. Dunkle Ringe haben sich unter seinen Augen gebildet. Als du dich näherst, springt er von den Knien hoch und macht mit ruckartigen Bewegungen das Zeichen des {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Adlers{/g}.{/n} "Lord Captain! Ihr seid hier! Ich habe daran geglaubt — nein, ich wusste, Ihr würdet kommen!"
languages.original_text: {n}A young man is praying beside the reliquary. His hair is dishevelled and his sweat-stained uniform is crumpled. Dark circles have formed underneath his eyes. As you approach, he jumps up from his knees and makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} with a jerky motion.{/n} "Lord Captain! You are here! I believed— nay, I knew you would come!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein junger Mann betet neben dem Reliquiar. Seine Haare sind zerzaust, seine verschwitzte Uniform ist zerknittert. Dunkle Ringe haben sich unter seinen Augen gebildet. Als du dich näherst, springt er von den Knien hoch und macht mit ruckartigen Bewegungen das Zeichen des Adlers.{/n} "Lord Captain! Ihr seid hier! Ich habe daran geglaubt — nein, ich wusste, dass Ihr kommen würdet!"

languages.text: {n}Kutsal emanet odasının yanında genç bir adam diz çökmüş dua ediyor. Saçları darmadağın ve ter lekeli üniforması buruş buruş. Gözlerinin altında siyah halkalar oluşmuş. Yaklaştığını görünce ayağa kalkıyor ve düzensiz bir hareketle {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Çift Başlı Kartal{/g} işareti yapıyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Buradasınız! Geleceğinize inanıyordum... Hayır, geleceğinizi biliyordum!"
languages.original_text: {n}A young man is praying beside the reliquary. His hair is dishevelled and his sweat-stained uniform is crumpled. Dark circles have formed underneath his eyes. As you approach, he jumps up from his knees and makes the sign of the {g|Encyclopedia:Aquila}Aquila{/g} with a jerky motion.{/n} "Lord Captain! You are here! I believed— nay, I knew you would come!"
